verses.verse: שָׁפְטֵ֤נִי <WH8199> Judge אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <WH430> me O God וְרִ֘יבָ֤ה <WH7378> and plead רִיבִ֗י <WH7379> my cause מִגּ֥וֹי <WH1471> nation לֹא־ <WH3808> not חָסִ֑יד <WH2623> godly מֵ֤אִישׁ־ <WH376> man מִרְמָ֖ה <WH4820> me from the deceitful וְעַוְלָ֣ה <WH5766> and unjust תְפַלְּטֵֽנִי׃ <WH6403> O deliver

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <WH859> You אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> For thou [art] the God מָֽעוּזִּי֮ <WH4581> of my strength לָמָ֪ה <WH4100> why זְנַ֫חְתָּ֥נִי <WH2186> why dost thou cast me off לָֽמָּה־ <WH4100> Why קֹדֵ֥ר <WH6937> I mourning אֶתְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <WH1980> ? why go בְּלַ֣חַץ <WH3906> because of the oppression אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> of the enemy

שְׁלַח־ <WH7971> O send out אוֹרְךָ֣ <WH216> thy light וַ֭אֲמִתְּךָ <WH571> and thy truth הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> them יַנְח֑וּנִי <WH5148> let them lead יְבִיא֥וּנִי <WH935> me let them bring אֶל־ <WH413> about הַֽר־ <WH2022> hill קָ֝דְשְׁךָ֗ <WH6944> me unto thy holy וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH4908> and to thy tabernacles

וְאָב֤וֹאָה ׀ <WH935> Then will I go אֶל־ <WH413> to מִזְבַּ֬ח <WH4196> unto the altar אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> to אֵל֮ <WH410> unto God שִׂמְחַ֪ת <WH8057> my exceeding גִּ֫ילִ֥י <WH1524> joy וְאוֹדְךָ֥ <WH3034> will I praise בְכִנּ֗וֹר <WH3658> yea upon the harp אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> thee O God אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> my God

מַה־ <WH4100> Why תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י ׀ <WH7817> Why art thou cast down נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> any וּֽמַה־ <WH4100> Why תֶּהֱמִ֪י <WH1993> disturbed עָ֫לָ֥י <WH5921> within הוֹחִ֣ילִי <WH3176> within me? hope לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> in God כִּי־ <WH3588> for ע֣וֹד <WH5750> shall again אוֹדֶ֑נּוּ <WH3034> for I shall yet praise יְשׁוּעֹ֥ת <WH3444> him [who is] the health פָּ֝נַ֗י <WH6440> of my countenance וֵֽאלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> and my God
